attributes.action: help us get more jobs for younger people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are doing this petition for our year 9 learning futures project at harlington upper school.This petition is very important to us because we will be leaving school probably within the next five years. At the moment because of the economic crisis most teenagers leaving school, go to college/university or become unemployed.So we are starting this petition to try and help teens leaving school. This means that the college's are becoming fuller, then they have to charge more for new applicants and raise the grade expectations for new  applicants.
Please help our cause and read our petition.

thank you
